elements.title: Crossmichael Parish Church (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that within the graveyard of the Category A–listed Crossmichael Parish Church, there is a memorial (pictured) to William Gordon of Greenlaw that is itself designated Category A in its own right?

elements.title: Juanita Lascarro (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Colombian singer Juanita Lascarro became a soprano at the Oper Frankfurt, where she appeared as both Calypso and Penelope in a new production of Dallapiccola's Ulisse?

elements.title: Akbar Bhawan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Akbar Bhawan, which houses the South Asian University and offices of India's Ministry of External Affairs, was originally a hotel?

elements.title: Bkub Okawa (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Pop Team Epic creator Bkub Okawa is also a virtual YouTuber?

elements.title: Little Rock campaign (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after the Little Rock campaign, Union forces held three-quarters of Arkansas?

elements.title: Alena Analeigh Wicker (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alena Analeigh Wicker is the youngest Black person to be accepted into medical school in the United States and the youngest person to work as an intern at NASA?

elements.title: Mexican Pizza (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Taco Bell initially commissioned a TikTok musical for their Mexican Pizza?

elements.title: Curtis Imrie (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Curtis Imrie won three world championships as a pack burro racer?
